{"id":942773551,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 6 days","timestamp":1682963316,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"31 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/942773551/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int rightSum = accumulate(nums.begin(), nums.end(), 0);\n        int leftSum = 0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            rightSum -= nums[i];\n\n            if(leftSum == rightSum){\n                return i;\n            }\n\n            leftSum += nums[i];\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
